
\documentclass[11pt,letterpaper,sans]{moderncv}   % possible options include font size ('10pt', '11pt' and '12pt'), paper size ('a4paper', 'letterpaper', 'a5paper', 'legalpaper', 'executivepaper' and 'landscape') and font family ('sans' and 'roman')

% moderncv themes
\moderncvstyle{classic}                        % style options are 'casual' (default) and 'classic' 
\moderncvcolor{black}                          % color options 'blue' (default), 'orange', 'green', 'red', 'purple', 'grey' and 'black'

% character encoding
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}

% adjust the page margins
\usepackage[scale=0.75]{geometry}
\setlength{\hintscolumnwidth}{1cm}           % if you want to change the width of the column with the dates


\usepackage[ngerman]{babel}
\usepackage[official]{eurosym}

%\usepackage{apalike}

% bibliography with mutiple entries
\usepackage{multibib}
\newcites{publications}{Peer-review Manuscripts}
\newcites{talks}{Conference Contributions}
%\usepackage{natbib}
\usepackage{bibentry}
\nobibliography*

\makeatletter
\renewcommand*{\bibliographyitemlabel}{\@biblabel{\arabic{enumiv}}}
\makeatother

\section{Publication Record}

\nocitepublications{*}
\bibliographystylepublications{plainyr_gh}
\bibliographypublications{publications}              % 'publications' is the name of a BibTeX file

\vline
\setcounter{enumiv}{0}
\nocitetalks{*}
\bibliographystyletalks{plainyr_gh}
\bibliographytalks{talks}              % 'publications' is the name of a BibTeX file
